TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted: The game development was reverted back to the start, as Unity engine has been outlawed. Now there are plenty of mods that bring back the old parts, but all are badly modeled.

I wish for a wife, I need someone to clean up my place, It's a dump!

Granted. She is a modern wife, not a wife of the 1950s, and expects you to clean up after yourself and then give her a foot massage.

I wish for a foot massage.

Granted, by Edward scissor hands!!!

I wish for a self-cleaning house that doesn't throw away stuff that's important for me.

Granted.

It doesn't throw out anything that you want to keep.

I wish to own and control the One Ring.

Granted. Sour-man (saruman) decides to steal it and your soul gets consumed.

I wish for enough gold to crush the sun.

Granted, you destroy the sun and then the Earth loses its orbit and becomes a frozen wasteland in time. You monster.

I wish for wish ideas

Granted - You could wish to become Superman, but this wish will get horribly corrupted.

I wish something good would happen to me now.

Granted, you accidentally wish yourself to get killed but that wish gets horribly corrupted resulting in you surviving thus making the above post ultimately useless.

i wish to be da supman

Nope.

I wish I had a pet Flareon

DENIED. BECAUSE YOU GOT TURNED INTO ONE. AND YOU ARE ONLY LEVEL 1. WELCOME TO THE NO-SUPERMAN BAMAN PIDERMAN UNIVERSE D*CK.

I wish people would grant my damn wishes.

Granted. Only wishes in which you damn someone or something are granted.

I wish for 64-bit KSP for Windows.

Granted, but your computer will freeze.

I wish for my copy of KSP to stop crashing so much.

Granted. But the only way for it to not crash is to not run it, so it gets deleted.

I wish for some cake that is a truth.
Granted. The cake is truth, but this statement is false. But i choose true. So you get stuck in a paradox.

404 Wish not found

I want 64 bit KSP for Windows in the next few seconds.

You get KSP 64-bit; but your processor reverts to 16-bit 8MHz.

I wish for chocolate.

granted, you get it but cant eat it because your suddenly allergic (hope i spelled that right)

i wish for nothing

granted but now your allergic

i wish for ksp 1.23.5

Granted. You have to pay $3,000 for it, and only you own the greater than 1 KSP version (ever). You accidentally forget the registration code for Wishmaking Fairy Pirated Services from the Future edition KSP, the illegal business quickly goes out.

I wish the "Wishmaking Fairy Services Pirated from the Future" company was excluded from copyright laws.

Granted, they are excluded from the planet altogether. Poor heavies tho.

I wish for homestuck to update.

Granted, it's now just a white screen which says "homestead has been updated"

I wish for us to land a crewed mssion to Mars.

granted

but i'm on it...

i wish that kerbal space program replaced minecraft

Granted: it's Mars 1 and the astronauts die of radiation shortly after departure.

I wish we conducted a manned landing & return mission to Mars!

Granted, the astronauts die of Mars related disease shortly before return.

I wish I could teleport bread.

Granted. You now have tumors. You only have 3 days to live.

I wish for a cylindrical portal mechanism.
